title: Question of prejudice
brief_description: A study of the racist atitudes of some Australians toward migrant Australians, highligting the ‘wog’ syndrome. Investigtes the discrimination shown in the workforce towards groups such as the Lebanese, and its human effects such as the loss of self-esteem. Includes the views of Robert Cameron (White Australia Movement) and children.
